00120 int uid2name( char * name, uid_t uid )
00121 {
00122   struct passwd * p ;
00123 
00124   if( ( p = getpwuid( uid ) ) == NULL )
00125     return 0 ;
00126 
00127   strncpy( name, p->pw_name, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00128   return 1 ;
00129 } /* uid2name */
00130 
00143 int name2uid( char * name, uid_t * puid )
00144 {
00145   struct passwd * passwd ;
00146   uid_t           uid ;
00147   
00148 
00149   if( uidmap_get( name, (unsigned long *)&uid ) == ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00150    {
00151      *puid = uid ;
00152    }
00153   else
00154    {
00155     if( ( passwd = getpwnam( name ) ) == NULL )
00156       {
00157         *puid = -1 ;
00158         return 0 ;
00159       }
00160     else
00161       {
00162         *puid = passwd->pw_uid ;
00163 
00164         if( uidmap_add( name, passwd->pw_uid ) != ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00165           return 0 ;
00166 
00167       }
00168     }
00169 
00170   return 1 ;
00171 } /* name2uid */
00172 
00185 int gid2name( char * name, gid_t gid )
00186 {
00187   struct group * g ;
00188 
00189 
00190   if( ( g = getgrgid( gid ) ) == NULL )
00191     return 0 ;
00192 
00193   strncpy( name, g->gr_name, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00194 
00195   return 1 ;
00196 } /* gid2name */
00197 
00210 int name2gid( char * name, gid_t * pgid )
00211 {
00212   struct group * g ;
00213   gid_t          gid ;
00214 
00215   if( gidmap_get( name, (unsigned long *)&gid ) == ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00216    {
00217         *pgid = gid ;
00218    }
00219   else
00220    {
00221      if( ( g = getgrnam( name ) ) == NULL )
00222        {
00223          *pgid = -1 ;
00224          return 0 ;
00225        }
00226      else
00227        {
00228          *pgid = g->gr_gid ;
00229 
00230          if( gidmap_add( name, g->gr_gid ) != ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00231            return 0 ;
00232        }
00233    }
00234   return 1 ;
00235 } /* name2gid */

00250 int uid2str( uid_t uid, char * str ) 
00251 {
00252   char buffer[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00253   
00254   if( uid2name( buffer, uid ) == 0 )
00255     return -1 ;
00256   
00257   return sprintf( str, "%s@localdomain", buffer ) ; /* BUGAZOMEU temporary: domain name should be setable somewhere */
00258 } /* uid2utf8 */
00259 
00272 int gid2str(  gid_t gid, char * str )
00273 {
00274   char buffer[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00275 
00276   if( gid2name( buffer, gid ) == 0 )
00277     return -1 ;
00278 
00279   return sprintf( str, "%s@localdomain", buffer ) ; /* BUGAZOMEU temporary: domain name should be setable somewhere */
00280 } /* gid2str */

00296 int uid2utf8( uid_t uid, utf8string * utf8str ) 
00297 {
00298   char buff[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00299 
00300   if( uid2str( uid, buff ) == -1 )
00301     return -1 ;
00302 
00303   /* A matching uid was found, now do the conversion to utf8 */
00304   return str2utf8( buff, utf8str ) ;
00305 
00306 } /* uid2utf8 */
00307 
00308 
00321 int gid2utf8( gid_t gid, utf8string * utf8str ) 
00322 {
00323   char buff[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00324   
00325   if( gid2str( gid, buff ) == -1 )
00326     return -1 ;
00327       
00328   /* A matching gid was found */
00329   /* Do the conversion to uft8 format */
00330   return str2utf8( buff, utf8str ) ;
00331 } /* gid2utf8 */
00332 
00333 
00345 int utf82uid( utf8string * utf8str, uid_t * Uid )
00346 {
00347   char buff[2*MAXNAMLEN] ;
00348   char uidname[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00349   char domainname[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00350   struct passwd * passwd ;
00351   
00352   if( utf8str->utf8string_len == 0 )
00353     {
00354       *Uid = -1 ; /* Nobofy */
00355       return -1 ;
00356     }
00357   
00358   strncpy( buff, utf8str->utf8string_val, utf8str->utf8string_len );
00359   buff[utf8str->utf8string_len] = '\0' ;
00360   
00361   /* User is shown as a string 'user@domain' */
00362   nfs4_stringid_split( buff, uidname, domainname ) ;
00363   
00364   name2uid( uidname, Uid ) ;
00365 
00366   return 0 ;
00367 } /* utf82uid */
00368 
00380 int utf82gid( utf8string * utf8str, gid_t * Gid )
00381 {
00382   char buff[2*MAXNAMLEN] ;
00383   char gidname[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00384   char domainname[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00385   struct group * grp  ;
00386   
00387   if( utf8str->utf8string_len == 0 )
00388     {
00389       *Gid = -1 ; /* Nobody */
00390       return 0 ;
00391     }    
00392   
00393   
00394   strncpy( buff, utf8str->utf8string_val, utf8str->utf8string_len );
00395   buff[utf8str->utf8string_len] = '\0' ;
00396   
00397   /* Group is shown as a string 'group@domain' */
00398   nfs4_stringid_split( buff, gidname, domainname ) ;
00399 
00400   name2gid( gidname, Gid ) ;
00401  
00402   return 0 ;
00403 } /* utf82gid */
